text: 2.7: Stt 19.1-16Mba tugen, tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui guma Rot, ana Sodoman ki. Ana kav, mba tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi mbui tɨvi garim, mbe mbarkɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbuav, fhura ferferav ruarir wari ndi tɨvi mbatɨgi, mbe Sodoman nta mbui. Rot mbe tɨvi gangiap, ana guigira ndav simgi. Mba tugen, Fhe Bakɨme taagiap Rot ndigim, ana mbatɨgi fhu.
